source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening
source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.

items.title: Build a Pizza Oven for FREE

visible_instructors.name: Cari
visible_instructors.title: Cari Corbet-Owen
visible_instructors.job_title: Clinical Psychologist, Author, Speaker & Natural Builder

items.headline: Bake bread and yummy pizza's, casseroles and much more!
objectives_summary: You will be able to build your own pizza oven for free even if you've never built before
You will know how to procure your materials for FREE
You will be able to site and design your own pizza oven even if you've never designed before.

How to safely secure your Inner Perimeter

How to set the tone in your home

items.title: DIY Home Inspection

visible_instructors.title: Steve Worsley
visible_instructors.job_title: Wyoming's #1 Mold Mitigation Contractor and Mold Consultant

items.headline: Do you have what it takes to do a home inspection?
objectives_summary: You will be able to do a beginners home inspection on a home you plan to buy or on your current home.
You should be able to identify major building defects in a home.
Home Inspections

items.title: How To Sculpt Your Own Earth Oven: For Home or Business
items.headline: Become Famous for Creating the BEST Wood-Fired, Clay-Baked Pizza, Breads & Exotic Dishes - for Home or Restaurants

BUILD with Clay (or Earth), Sand, and Rock
CREATE a Beautiful Rock Base to dramatize your Oven- with little or NO cement

items.title: The Ultimate Bathroom Renovation Guide
items.headline: By Naomi Findlay PhD
objectives_summary: Transform your bathroom without remodel overwhelm or budget confusion.
Determine where you can splurge and where you can save, by picking your “dream,” “budget conscious,” and “reality” options for over 35 bathroom elements
Know exactly where your money is going so you can plan appropriately.

items.headline: Go from garden, or container, to plate with confidence and flair and make stunning dishes using edible flowers.
objectives_summary: Be able to state the precautions necessary to take when harvesting edible flowers.
be able to successfully plant up a pot of edible flower plants
Learn to grow plants for seeds and what is necessary to have a great germination rate.

items.title: Woodworking: Setting Up and Using Jointers & Planers

visible_instructors.name: George
visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America

items.headline: This course will help you get the most out of your jointer & planer by helping properly set them and use them safely.
objectives_summary: This woodworking course provides many important tips & fundamentals to get the most out of your jointer and planer.
How to set up your machines correctly for optimal performance.
Jointer & planer safety, how to read wood grain for proper feed direction and more.
